name: Grandma's Honey Bun Cake
author: Drea
summary: Sooo bad for you, but tastes sooo good. My family loves this cake; it tastes just like a honey bun.
directions: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Combine cake mix, sour cream, eggs, and oil in a bowl
Beat with an electric mixer for 3 minutes
Pour half of the batter into the prepared baking pan
Mix brown sugar and cinnamon together in a small bowl
Sprinkle over batter in the pan
Carefully pour the remainder of the batter over the cinnamon-sugar layer
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, 45 to 50 minutes
Mix confectioners' sugar, milk, and vanilla together in a bowl
Poke holes in the hot cake with a fork and pour sugar mixture over the top of the cake
Let cake cool completely before serving, about 30 minutes
